update article

update article set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content_md = #{contentMd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, origin = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, browse_num = #{browseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, publish_time = #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
